name: Toast Explorer
description: this is my first game on itch, and it's also my first 3d game :D, the game is still in development so sorry for the bugs and unfinished stuff, Toast Explorer is a unique endless runner for not only you can move right and left, but you can move all up, down, right and left, don't be scared to report bugs as I will always try to make this game better, and more enjoyable!, have fun :D
